Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{3: 'F.O.S. Academy. Please ensure that you have all your personal belongings with you when alighting.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory546.jpg'}
{3: 'With the door now open, the Gray Ravens step out—and are surprised to see that the "F.O.S. Academy" before them is not as they remember it.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Where exactly is this...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The Science Council. The road sign is there.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What are we doing here, though?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Conductor', 3: "We'll need a few more passengers to kick off roaming officially. Do allow me to explain the rules using Lee as an example...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: "While ensuring everyone's safety, of course.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I don't know why you sound so confident...", 4: '1'}
{2: "But aren't you going to get off?", 3: '24'}
{3: 'Having asked all of you to get off, the mechanoid is now looking this way from inside the train.'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: '...No. A conductor cannot leave his train, just like how a captain cannot leave his ship.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: "I'll be observing all of you from the train.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Seemingly to assure all of you, Conductor waves this way.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I... have a bad feeling about this.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What is it, Lee?', 3: '32'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Well, it's just that it feels awful getting bossed around by a mechanoid...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'And being watched at all times.', 4: '1'}
{3: "While unsure how they're supposed to go about what they've been told to do, the Gray Ravens, seeing that they don't have other choices, walk down the hall."}
{3: 'A few minutes into walking down the hall, however, the Gray Ravens hear something coming from up ahead.'}
{2: '???', 3: '...Where are the codes? Where are they?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Coming this way is a group of Constructs—with bags of all sizes and weapons of all sorts.'}
{3: "Judging from the geological survey equipment and portable radiometric dating equipment they're carrying and the colorful dirt on their bags, you can tell that they don't fight."}
{3: 'This group of Constructs is obviously an archaeological team.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vice-Captain of Archaeological Team', 3: 'Uhm? Wait...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Construct leading the team salutes your way.'}
{2: 'Vice-Captain of Archaeological Team', 3: 'There you are, at long last!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vice-Captain of Archaeological Team', 3: 'Lee!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vice-Captain of Archaeological Team', 3: "Thank God you are here, which means we don't have to go to the Science Council to dig the data out.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Wait, what in the world is...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Expedition Member A', 3: 'The Gray Ravens... and Lee! Please, sir! I have a few quick questions for you here!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Expedition Member B', 3: 'Stop pushing me. Uhm, sir, I was just wondering if you could quickly shed some light... on the structure of the materials in Hetero Tower...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Expedition Member C', 3: 'Jeez, my foot...', 4: '3'}
{3: 'Before you know it, you and the rest of Gray Raven have been surrounded by the overly excited Constructs.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Why are they all trying to talk to Lee?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Does any of the missions we've been on recently have to do with WGAA and their archaeological team?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Not that I remember...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Trying his best to handle the Constructs, Lee seems every bit as confused as the rest of Gray Raven.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...Can someone please just explain to me what's going on?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vice-Captain of Archaeological Team', 3: 'Right... Apologies. Guess we got a little worked up here.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vice-Captain of Archaeological Team', 3: "But, see, we're all very inspired by everything you did in the battle at Hetero Tower.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vice-Captain of Archaeological Team', 3: "Especially when Hetero Tower was... revolu... revo... What's the word again?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Expedition Member A', 3: 'Reversed!', 4: '2'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Vice-Captain of Archaeological Team', 3: 'Right. So, when Hetero Tower was reversed, we submitted a request to Sir Nikola asking him to send us on an expedition mission around the area.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'For archaeological purposes?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Why would you want to go there, though? I can't think of anything there that's going to be worth your while.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Expedition Member B', 3: 'But, you see, the stratum there changed drastically after Hetero Tower rose up, and this is what we found...!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The satellite map on the screen shows a few zones that are extra bright.'}

{2: 'Expedition Member B', 3: "No matter where you go in this world, there are things waiting to be discovered! Just because they haven't been found, doesn't mean they aren't worth anyone's while.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Expedition Member A', 3: "I know, right? Someone's spent three years digging but hasn't found anything worth mentioning.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Expedition Member B', 3: "I'm going to make your jaw drop when I hit the jackpot!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Expedition Member B', 3: 'So shut your trap already, you lousy janitor!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Expedition Member A', 3: "Oh? Why don't you give cleaning a try, then?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'With his members quarreling, the vice-captain of the archaeological team moves over this way.'}
{2: 'Vice-Captain of Archaeological Team', 3: 'Please have a look at this.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Is this... a broom?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She shows Lee a stick-like device with all sorts of weird items tied to it. From the bristles at its end, you can tell that it is—or that it used to be—a broom.'}
{2: 'Vice-Captain of Archaeological Team', 3: 'This is a cleanup brush we redesigned to cope with the Punishing Virus.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Are you sure this thing works...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vice-Captain of Archaeological Team', 3: 'Engineering Department has checked it and said it works.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vice-Captain of Archaeological Team', 3: "And I've also got... this.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She shows Lee another object that looks like a spatula.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "And I gather you guys cook when you're out on missions?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vice-Captain of Archaeological Team', 3: 'This is not a spatula but a shovel we use to remove dirt! And, of course, we redesigned it to...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Totally got it. So you were saying you guys wanted to go on an expedition mission around Hetero Tower, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vice-Captain of Archaeological Team', 3: 'That would be correct, yes.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Not trying to burst your bubble here, but there is still a lot we don't understand about the tower.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Even if the area of free of threat from the virus, Task Force will be prioritized when it comes to taking on an expedition mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Which is to say that the request you submitted most likely won't be approved.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vice-Captain of Archaeological Team', 3: 'But...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'There is so much more to that tower than meets the eye.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'I can make your wish come true, though.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Following the robotic voice, "Conductor" appears behind all of you.'}
{3: 'With the same swing of its robotic claw that you saw it did before, the archaeological team goes poof. Then, your surroundings start transforming...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory298.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory565.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory656.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory655.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{3: 'Into an eerie space of crimson red.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Wait, what in the world...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'No stranger to this place, are you, Lee?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '...How did you find out about these?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Taking a step forward, Lee tightens his hand around his gun.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Conductor', 3: "Roaming works by picking up historical data that's important to you from the past year, replaying it, and determining the historical values of these digital tidbits.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Conductor', 3: "While the battle report you submitted to the Science Council lacked in details and core information, Lee, what's in there was sufficient for me to form a preliminary ecological model.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: "And the battle you went through at Hetero Tower, Lee... I can see that it's rather significant to you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: "And to verify it, new interaction is required... and I'm sure we all know the drill here.", 4: '1'}
